name: Bunny Triggered
description: After your Amber, who has this card equipped, uses a Normal Attack: If this card and Baron Bunny are still on the field, then Baron Bunny explodes and deals 4 Pyro DMG.
descriptionraw: After your $[A1304], who has this card equipped, uses a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color>: If this card and <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113041]</color> are still on the field, then <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113041]</color> explodes and deals 4 $[K103].
descriptionreplaced: After your Amber, who has this card equipped, uses a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color>: If this card and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Baron Bunny</color> are still on the field, then <color=#FFFFFFFF>Baron Bunny</color> explodes and deals 4 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>.
